name: Exorcist's Hut
description:
Use arrows to select

Game made to mini game jam [72 hours]The game has a lot of bugs (and will be updated after jam ends), but it can be completed! Yeap, the game has an end.

A challenging game about an exorcist

!Most of the text in the game is made with the help of deepl!

Music: Children of the Spit God by Plasticine Cowboy is licensed under a Attribution 4.0 International License.
